nodes.text: Bell's Cantina was a cantina built by 10 BBY. It was located on the Gus Treta Inner-System Market Station, a space station that orbited Gus Treta, a moon of the planet Corellia in the Core Worlds' Corellian system. Known for having the cheapest spiced ale in the system, it was often frequented by spacers.

Liddy Ravora was a waitress at Bell's Cantina but left to become an amateur infochant after realizing the value of information. After making a large amount of money as an infochant, Ravora decided to return and buy the establishment in 10 BBY. The cantina was still operational over a decade later.
Bell's Cantina was mentioned in Suns of Fortune, a sourcebook for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game, released in 2014 by Fantasy Flight Games.
